original_text: And Abram said to the king of Sodom, I have lift up mine hand unto the Lord, the most high God, the possessor of heaven and earth,
korean_text: 아브람이 소돔 왕에게 이르되 천지의 주재이시요 지극히 높으신 하나님 여호와께 내가 손을 들어 맹세하노니

sentences.original_text: And Abram said to the king of Sodom,
I have lift up mine hand unto the Lord,
the possessor of heaven and earth,
